adjective.description: Relating to or denoting research undertaken after the completion of doctoral research.
examples: he is currently seeking a postdoctorate position

noun.description: A period of research undertaken after the completion of doctoral research.
examples: a two-year postdoctorate on sensory biology

noun.description: A person engaged in postdoctorate research.
examples: the team will be composed of two scientists and two postdoctorates
